data.actual_result: Word formats the markdown as italics
data.expected_result: Word formats the markdown correctly, or bold because of triple star not working
data.short_description: Triple star markdown appears as italics in in-app notifications
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you can receive in-app notifications - Have someone DM or mention you with a word using triple star markdown - Observe the word in the in-app notification
